description:
The trial version only allows you to open two apps at once. It seems to work fine with these two. You can only show one app at a time as far as I can see, though I haven't spent very long on it. So if you want all your web apps (incl. separate browser windows) in one window so you can switch between them, it's fine. If you want to view more than one of them at a time, this doesn't appear to allow you to do that. If you're looking for an alternative to having web apps open in tabs in a browser, it's certainly a tidier way to do that with a cleaner screen as a result, and according to the blurb it sandboxes each app. I think those are the main differences from having multiple tabs open in a browser.

To be able to use it with more than 2 apps you have to purchase a perpetual license key for $9.99 (that's on 31st March 2020).
summary: Seems OK, though limited use without paying one-off license fee

description: Great app. I'm using it for the past two years. I was earlier using appImage of this application. Everything works fine with appIamge. But coming to the snap package, I am unable to access the connected webcam. Even though I can access my USB mic but not the webcam, please fix that.
That's all I need it for, and it works great!
Clicking on a plus sign to add new account does nothig. Tried reinstalling and restarting and still nothing.
Opens up after a long wait. Then it is as dumb as hell and won't do anything.

Ich habe ursprünglich nach einer guten Variante für WhatApp Desktop gesucht und bin hier drauf gestoßen. 
Ich hatte zwar gehofft, dass man mehr als zwei Konten hinzufügen kann, aber nachdem mir der gesamte Funktionsumfang klar geworden ist, überlege ich mir, die Vollversion zuzulegen.
summary: Macht genau das, was es soll

description: te cobran por más de 2 aplicaciones para agregar, en Linux eso no sirve, no recomendable para los que les gusta Linux y el Open Sourse

Recomiendo pagarla, el pago es solo una vez en la vida y la tienes para siempre.

Completamente recomendable ya que se pueden tener todas las cuentas en el mismo lugar, whatsapp, twitter, gmail, drive, telegram y muchas mas, además se pueden poner las aplicaciones del banco lo cual me facilita mucho el trabajo.
summary: Muy recomendable, pagas una sola vez y la tienes para siempre

description:
Cette application est bien pratique et fonctionne très bien sur chaque service proposé. 
Chaque service est 100% fonctionnel avec toutes les options qui les caractérises. (pas besoin d'installer d'autres appli). 
Le paramétrage de l'apparence est un vrai confort surtout en terme d'accessibilité
Тупо браузер который открывает вебинтрефейсы разных мессенджеров при этом просит 25 баксов.
